kit.leader_skill: "Demonic Power" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%; "Battle of Wits" or "Accelerated Battle" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +10% for characters who also belong to the "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category ("Demonic Power" Category characters excluded)

super_attack.name: Flash Bolt
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; Lowers ATK & DEF

passive_skill.name: Mysterious Young Majin
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 100% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a medium chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) Medium chance of evading enemy's attack; As the 3rd attacker in a turn: All allies' ATK & DEF 30% up for 2 turns; When attacking: ATK & DEF 100% up; For every attack performed: ATK & DEF 20% up within the turn

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a medium chance of becoming a Super Attack

All allies' ATK & DEF 30% up for 2 turns
lines.context: As the 3rd attacker in a turn

lines.text: ATK & DEF 20% up within the turn
